Desc.entry: A project run by Sustrans in partnership with Sheffield City Council, aims to promote cycling as a healthy, environmentally friendly way to get to school. Schools taking part are Acres Hill, All Saints RC School, Ballifield Primary, Brunswick Primary, Carter Knowle, Emmanuel Junior School, Greystones Primary, Handsworth Grange, Halfway Junior School, Hinde House Primary School, Hunters Bar Junior, Lower Meadow Primary School, Meersbrook Bank Primary, Meynell Primary, Norton Free Primary School, Pipworth Primary, Porter Croft Church of England Primary, Reignhead Primary, Rivelin Primary School, Sharrow Primary, Stocksbridge Junior, St Catherine's Primary, Totley Primary School, Valley Park Primary School, Watercliffe Meadow, Westfield Sports College, Wisewood Primary School and Wisewood Secondary School, Yewlands Secondary.
